entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I assist you today?
Yeah, I want to return something. I bought a VeloBand Pulse a little while ago, and it's just not working out for me.
I understand. I can certainly help you with that. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?
It's under [customer email address]. And hurry up about it, I'm kind of in a rush.
Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order. Okay, I see your purchase of the VeloBand Pulse. What is the reason for the return?
It's not accurate! The heart rate readings are all over the place. It's supposed to be a smart watch but it's acting dumb! I want my money back.
I apologize you're having trouble with the VeloBand Pulse. Our goal is for you to be happy with our products. To confirm, you are looking to initiate a return for a full refund?
Yes, a full refund! How long is this going to take? I bought it maybe... two weeks ago?

Let me check the purchase date. I see it was purchased 15 days ago. Not a problem. Here at VeloFit, we have a generous return policy of 90 days on most of our items, to ensure your satisfaction. That definitely covers you.
Ninety days? Really? Well, that's good to hear. Some places only give you like, 10 days. So, what do I do now?

That's correct! Our return policy is designed with you in mind. I can go ahead and start the return process. We will email you a prepaid shipping label. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse back in its original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at the nearest [Shipping Carrier] location. Once we receive it, we'll process your refund.
Okay, great. That sounds easy enough.
Perfect. You'll receive the email with the shipping label within the next hour. Is there anything else I can assist you with today regarding the VeloBand Pulse or any other VeloFit products?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for the help. I appreciate it. Much better than I expected after some of the headaches I've had with the smart watch.
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business and apologize again for the inconvenience. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to call us back. Have a great day!
